attributes.action: Remove ourselves from these devastating wars and all families in uk will donate £1000 to our national debt
attributes.additional_details:
A bit of give and take.

With the Internet and information at our fingertips we all know current world affairs are both horrific and a terrible waste of resources.

If the government decides to slowly pull out of all wars that don't involve a primary threat to our country we, the working man, will donate £1000 to help our currently sorry country.

This will not be a tax, this will be an optional gesture of goodwill.
